newsitem.title: USA: Mesaba September load factor rises.
newsitem.headline: Mesaba September load factor rises.

text.p: Mesaba Airlines, a unit of Mesaba Holdings Inc, said its September passenger load factor rose 6.1 points to 49.2 percent from 43.1 percent.
It said available seat miles gained 16.4 percent to 71.3 million from 61.2 million, and revenue passenger miles rose 33 percent to 35.1 million from 26.4 million.

Year to date, the carrier said its load factor was up 7.7 points to 54.3 per cent from 46.6 percent. Available seat miles increased 17.8 percent to 218.5 million from 185.5 million, and revenue passenger miles gained 37.4 percent to 118.7 million from 86.4 million.
